ema wakawanuwe di krikat tharagayak kerehi sanath jayasuriyage balapama ketharam wuwadayi kiwahoth prathiwadi kandayam sanathge kadulla dawaganima tharagaya jayaganima ha samanawama salaku kalayak thibuni. 2000 dashakaya aga bhagaya wana wita jayasuriya krikat pitiyen wishrama ganimath samanga indiya pithikaru wirendra shewag, oostreliyanu pithikaru adam gilkrist, dakunu aprikanu pithikaru harshal gibs wannawun sanath lesinma prawegakari pithikaranayanhi niratha wemin krikat pitiya warnawath kalath sanath kridawata ella kala balapame tharamatama balapamak ella kirimata owun kisiwekuta hakiyawak labune natha.
